job_description:
Job Description:
- Drive revenue growth by identifying, pursuing, and closing new business opportunities.
- Maintain and strengthen relationships with existing clients, ensuring customer satisfaction and long-term partnerships.
- Conduct market research to identify emerging opportunities, industry trends, and competitive positioning.
- Prepare and deliver high-impact presentations and pitch decks tailored to client and partner needs.
- Collaborate with internal teams (marketing, product, technical) to align solutions with client requirements.
- Develop and execute strategic plans to achieve annual sales and revenue targets.
- Represent the company in client meetings, networking events, and industry forums to expand business reach.


Qualifications
- Bachelorâ€™s degree in Business, Marketing, Management, or a related field from reputable universities.
- Minimum of 1 year of proven experience in B2B sales, preferably from System Integrators, Distributors, or related industries.
- Proven ability in preparing and delivering persuasive and results-driven pitch decks to senior stakeholders.


Skills & Competencies
- Exceptional negotiation, communication, and networking skills with the ability to influence decision-makers.
- Strong business acumen with a deep understanding of market dynamics and client needs.
- Established and reliable relationships with key partners, vendors, and industry networks.
- Strategic thinker with the ability to work independently while collaborating effectively across teams.
- Results-oriented mindset with a consistent track record of achieving or exceeding sales targets.
